132.heading: Erotic Arts.

132.author: by Antony Moebius

notes: Summary: A man drinks expired yogurt, and a girl refuses to put an awful thing back in its box.
Originally appeared in either Métal Hurlant or L'Echo des Savanes in the early 1970s; English version first appeared in Heavy Metal.
